titlestmt.titleproper: Academy of Natural Sciences of Philadelphia Geology and Paleontology Department records 1867-1992 1936-1978
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012

did.unittitle: Academy of Natural Sciences of Philadelphia Geology and Paleontology Department records

bioghist.p: The Department of Geology and Paleontology existed from about 1936 to 1978. Horace G. Richards joined the department in 1940, and was its Chairman from 1960 until his retirement in 1974. In 1978 the department and the invertebrate fossil collection were administratively absorbed by the Department of Malacology in that year.

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of records of the Department of Geology and Paleontology of the Academy of Natural Sciences, 1970 to 1980. Materials include: correspondence, annual reports, records related to exhibits, documentation of the move of the department's collections in 1977-1978, and inventory lists of fossil specimens (Pelecypoda, Gastropda, Cephalopoda). Other records include: negatives of fossil specimens; a small collection of old correspondence related to the acquisition of specimens (1894-1920s); index card files of donors of vertebrate paleontology, invertebrate paleontology, and paleobotany specimens in the Academy's collection, including donor name, date, and citations from Proceedings of the ANSP;; one reel of microfilm of the catalog of the Academy's invertebrate paleontology collection, filmed in 1986; and records related to Lewis Woolman's collection of artesian well borings. The collection also includes an inventory of the Academy's "rock" collection (not the Mineral Collection) at the time it was packed for storage in 1978. The collection was deaccessioned and transferred to the Wagner Free Institute of Science in 1993. Staff members with files in this collection include Horace G. Richards, and B.F. Howell.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

otherfindaid.p: An inventory is available in the repository.

relatedmaterial.p: Related material may be found in the following collections: Academy of Natural Sciences of Philadelphia: B. F. Howell papers, Horace G. Richards papers, and Academy of Natural Sciences of Philadelphia Malacology Department records.
